title: LeakTraceReference.owningClassName is null, and HeapAnalysisSuccess.heapDumpFile is not exists
body:
### Description

**error**:

reason : _LeakTraceReference.owningClassName_ is null

```
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Parameter specified as non-null is null: method kotlin.jvm.internal.Intrinsics.checkParameterIsNotNull, parameter $this$lastSegment
        at m.q0.o.d(Unknown Source:2)
        at shark.LeakTraceReference.getOwningClassSimpleName(LeakTraceReference.kt:38)
        at leakcanary.internal.DisplayLeakAdapter.i(DisplayLeakAdapter.kt:207)
        at leakcanary.internal.DisplayLeakAdapter.c(DisplayLeakAdapter.kt:148)
        at leakcanary.internal.DisplayLeakAdapter.getView(DisplayLeakAdapter.kt:84)
        at android.widget.AbsListView.obtainView(AbsListView.java:2437)
        at android.widget.ListView.makeAndAddView(ListView.java:2102)
        at android.widget.ListView.fillDown(ListView.java:817)
        at android.widget.ListView.originalFillGap(ListView.java:780)
        at android.widget.ListView.fillGap(ListView.java:766)
        at android.widget.AbsListView.trackMotionScroll(AbsListView.java:5404)
        at android.widget.ListView.trackMotionScroll(ListView.java:2019)
        at android.widget.AbsListView$FlingRunnable.run(AbsListView.java:4946)
        at android.view.Choreographer$CallbackRecord.run(Choreographer.java:1031)
        at android.view.Choreographer.doCallbacks(Choreographer.java:854)
        at android.view.Choreographer.doFrame(Choreographer.java:785)
        at android.view.Choreographer$FrameDisplayEventReceiver.run(Choreographer.java:1016)
        at android.os.Handler.handleCallback(Handler.java:883)
        at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:100)
        at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:224)
        at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:7562)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
        at com.android.internal.os.RuntimeInit$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(RuntimeInit.java:539)
        at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:950)
```

**LeakTraceReference.kt:38**

`
  val owningClassSimpleName: String get() = owningClassName.lastSegment('.')
`

**debug found**:

-  _HeapAnalysisSuccess.heapDumpFile_ is not exists
- LeakTraceReference(originObject=android.os.HandlerThread instance Leaking: UNKNOWN Thread name: 'AppMonitor_Client', referenceType=LOCAL, owningClassName=null, referenceName=)

### Version Information

* LeakCanary version: 2.6
* Android OS version: Android 10
* Gradle version: 4.1.2
